page.title: 02CARAVAN HOLIDAYS.
page.content: You can have a holiday in a horse drawn caravan at Porchfield.Mr and Mrs Dore have been running the Wight holiday caravans since 1981.They have five horse drawn caravans and seven cob horses to pull them.They have some other horses and ponies for riding, one New Forest pony called Sunny is 32 years old.The caravans hold four people and one horse pulls each one. They cannot pull the caravans up steep hills so they travel out towards Newtown,Shalfleet,Yarmouth,and Freshwater where the roads are flater. There have been two accidents with the caravans,one when a lorry crashed into the caravan and another when some cows kicked the caravans.
